ðŸ“– Summary: ExifLooter is a Go-based tool designed to extract geolocation data from image metadata. It can analyze individual images, entire directories, and even process URLs piped from other tools. The tool also integrates with OpenStreetMap to provide visual context for the extracted location data and offers functionality to remove metadata from images.
